name: part_005
file: tmp_【#夏色まつり生誕祭】4回目のバースデー♪【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [C-J0mGVamNc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC section on stage where Natsuiro Matsuri and guests prepare for their next performance.
Performance of the song 'Plasmagic Seasons!' by Natsuiro Matsuri and her guests.

subtitles.original: この5人が集まったということは...
subtitles.english: Since the five of us are gathered here...

subtitles.original: ほう...
subtitles.english: Ho...

subtitles.original: やっぱりあの曲を歌わないと始まらないですよね！
subtitles.english: It wouldn't be right if we didn't sing *that* song!

subtitles.original: なんだなんだ？
subtitles.english: What is it?

subtitles.original: え、何なんだ？
subtitles.english: Wait, what is it?

subtitles.original: あれだね、あれ！
subtitles.english: It's that one, right?

subtitles.original: あれしかないよね！わかるわかる！
subtitles.english: It has to be that one! I get it!

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？準備いい？
subtitles.english: Are you okay? Ready?

subtitles.original: もちろん！もちろん！
subtitles.english: Of course! Of course!

subtitles.original: オッケー！
subtitles.english: Okay!

subtitles.original: それじゃあいくよ！ミュージックスタート！
subtitles.english: Alright, here we go! Music start!

subtitles.original:
Plasmagic Seasons!
作詞：森本練　作曲・編曲：森本練・竹市佳伸
subtitles.english:
Plasmagic Seasons!
Lyrics: Ren Morimoto / Composition & Arrangement: Ren Morimoto, Yoshinobu Takeichi

subtitles.original: 輝く夜空 四季巡って
subtitles.english: Across the shining night sky, the four seasons pass

subtitles.original: 春風君を乗せて 夏色が迎えるよ
subtitles.english: Carrying you on the spring breeze, the colors of summer welcome you

subtitles.original: 煌めく秋が背中を押したら
subtitles.english: As the sparkling autumn gives you a push

subtitles.original: 真っ白 吹雪き煌めく めぐりめぐはーと
subtitles.english: Pure white, a blizzard sparkles, hearts keep circling

subtitles.original: 何にもわからない一歩進んで
subtitles.english: Taking a step forward without knowing anything

subtitles.original: やっとここまで辿り着けたね
subtitles.english: We've finally made it this far

subtitles.original: 待ちわびてる ずっと
subtitles.english: I've been waiting for a long time

subtitles.original: 素敵なステージ 一番に
subtitles.english: This wonderful stage, above all else

subtitles.original: 絶対見せてあげるよ (Oh!)
subtitles.english: I'll definitely show it to you (Oh!)

subtitles.original: Fly Fly Fly into your future
subtitles.english: Fly Fly Fly into your future

subtitles.original: 無邪気に回る季節が世界を
subtitles.english: The innocently turning seasons

subtitles.original: 駆け巡って 夢のような君へと
subtitles.english: Traverse the world, heading towards you who are like a dream

subtitles.original: Bright Bright Light of your future
subtitles.english: Bright Bright Light of your future

subtitles.original: 僕らがいた証をさあ 手を繋げよう
subtitles.english: Let's hold hands to show the proof that we were here

subtitles.original: スポットライトはついたばかり
subtitles.english: The spotlight has only just been turned on

subtitles.original: 赤らむ心 イルミネーション
subtitles.english: Blushing hearts, like illuminations

subtitles.original: 心は色とりどり 弾け舞うフェスティバル
subtitles.english: Our hearts are multicolored, a festival bursting into dance

subtitles.original: 幸せいっぱい注ごう ロゼグラス
subtitles.english: Let's pour plenty of happiness into our rose glasses

subtitles.original: 鳴らして キラッと染めるよ 真っさらな気持ち
subtitles.english: Make them ring out, I'll dye my brand new feelings with a sparkle

subtitles.original: 12時の鐘なんて忘れちゃって
subtitles.english: Forget about things like the clock striking midnight

subtitles.original: ずっと解けない魔法をかけよう
subtitles.english: Let's cast a spell that will never be broken

subtitles.original: ときめかして そっと
subtitles.english: Making my heart throb, gently

subtitles.original: 胸躍る時間を 送るから
subtitles.english: Because I'll give you a heart-pounding time

subtitles.original: 絶対ついておいでよ (Oh!)
subtitles.english: You definitely have to follow me (Oh!)

subtitles.original: Pop Pop Pop of your future
subtitles.english: Pop Pop Pop of your future

subtitles.original: 今を駆ける五つ星 世界を
subtitles.english: Five stars dashing through the present

subtitles.original: 巻き込んで 賑やかに遊ぼう
subtitles.english: Let's involve the world and play lively

subtitles.original: Flash Flash Flash of your future
subtitles.english: Flash Flash Flash of your future

subtitles.original: 目も眩むシチュエーション まだ 踊り足りないでしょ
subtitles.english: A dazzling situation. You haven't danced enough yet, have you?

subtitles.original: カーテンコールはずっとずっと先まで
subtitles.english: The curtain call is still a long, long way off

subtitles.original: 楽しむ気持ち さえ持ってきたら
subtitles.english: If you just bring a heart that's ready to have fun

subtitles.original: きっと誰もが主役になれるよ
subtitles.english: I'm sure anyone can become the protagonist

subtitles.original: あの日も今日も 笑顔をさらけ出して
subtitles.english: Both back then and today, show your smile

subtitles.original: もっとステップ もっとジャンプ ジャンプ 重なるよ この世界を
subtitles.english: Step more, jump more, jump. They overlap with this world.

subtitles.original: 一緒に遊び尽くそう (Oh!)
subtitles.english: Let's play to our hearts' content together (Oh!)

subtitles.original: Clap Clap Clap into your future
subtitles.english: Clap Clap Clap into your future

subtitles.original: このメロディが終わっても 決して 今日だけの 思い出にはしないよ
subtitles.english: Even if this melody ends, I will never let this be a memory of only today

subtitles.original: Fly Fly Fly into your future
subtitles.english: Fly Fly Fly into your future

subtitles.original: 無邪気に回る季節が世界を 駆け巡って 夢のような君へと
subtitles.english: The innocently turning seasons traverse the world, heading towards you who are like a dream

subtitles.original: Bright Bright Light of your future
subtitles.english: Bright Bright Light of your future

subtitles.original: 僕らがいた証をさあ 手を繋げよう
subtitles.english: Let's hold hands to show the proof that we were here

subtitles.original: スポットライトは終わらない
subtitles.english: The spotlight will never end
